text:
Description: Implement `grove cycle` command for cycling through running servers in browser.

From spec section 12.6:
- Cycles through all running servers in default browser
- Each invocation opens the next server URL
- Wraps around to first

Implementation:
- Store "current index" in temp file (~/.cache/grove/cycle-index)
- Increment on each call, wrap at end
- Open URL in default browser
Close reason: Implemented all Phase 4b features: grove review, grove cycle, and grove dashboard with SvelteKit web UI
